gov.sns.xal.tools.orbit
Class MutableBpmRecord

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gov.sns.xal.tools.orbit.BpmRecord
        |
        +--gov.sns.xal.tools.orbit.MutableBpmRecord
public class MutableBpmRecord
extends BpmRecord

Maintain statistics on BPM measurements. It is useful for use in a buffer since old samples can be discounted and new samples added.
